title: They're Like Crispy Green Crack
description: Paula Abdul "plane crash" she was involved in is going viral on TikTok and Dave was the first person to first point out that she was lying about it, we chat with Nelly and get him to agree to do something with the show this week, Weekend X Factor, Dave's Big Bus to Valley Fair, a very controversial Am I the Jerk involving celebrating someone's death, Think Fast, and more!
